name: 死亡幻局
description:
《死亡幻局》是一款恐怖类肉鸽卡牌策略剧情向游戏，你在这款游戏中将以男主角视角带入体验一场感人的意外。目前游戏中设计有9名不同身份的敌人、30+种道具21张生物卡及17张行动卡（持续更新中）。

世界观简述：
巴别塔生物科技公司的总部主楼是一座高耸入云的建筑，象征着超越人类“更高，更快，更强”的极限，追求下一层次的突破。
经过长达一年的观察，时机终于来到，主角的身心陷入最低谷，在准备离职时卷入一场车祸并且失忆。
这一切都是公司有意计划的，在医院他得到了受害者的眼睛移植，陷入幻觉之中，在未完全恢复的情况下被一知半解的请回公司，与其他实验者和自己的内心展开博弈，实验正式开始

制作团队：Ghost Cat

游戏尚在开发中。

死亡幻局 X GhostCat 玩家交流群：119277058

更多介紹可以去机核页面查看，喜欢这游戏的话请投我们一票

DeathMatchup is a horror roguelike card strategy story game, in which you are brought to experience a moving accident from the perspective of the hero. Currently there are 9 enemies with different identities, 30+ items, 21 creature cards, and 17 action cards (in the process of being updated).

Brief description of world outlook:

The main headquarters of Babel Biotechnology is a towering building, symbolizing the pursuit of the next level of breakthrough beyond the limits of human "higher, faster, stronger".

After a year of observation, the time finally comes when the main character's mind and body hit rock bottom, getting involved in a car accident and losing his memory while preparing to leave his job.

All this was deliberately planned by the company. In the hospital, he got the eye transplant of the victim, fell into hallucinations, and was invited back to the company with a little knowledge under the condition of incomplete recovery. He played games with other experimenters and his own heart, and the experiment officially began.

English version is cooming soon
